title: Came out from hiding
description: Decided to put myself out there more via socials as I lack any form of social presence. I hope you've found your way here as a result of that!

title: Forging with Foundry
description: Began a rent-manager while learning the Foundry (Solidity-only test suite)

title: Built A Token Burner
description: Handles the disposing of address balances of demo/test tokens in a very efficient way. /w UI.

title: Wrote custom ERC contracts
description: From forking with little-change to bespoke custom NFT and token functionality

title: Setup ENS with DNS
description: Obtained an ENS and binded the ENS protocol with traditional DNS to faciliate a web3 authToken/cookie token for a Snapshot space

title: Drank the Coolaid
description: Absorbed as much EVM related information as I could that I could finally put to use!

title: Graduated University!
description: Successfully completed my HNC in Software Development!

title: Started learning to code
description: At this point I started to really pivot my career choice. Returned to college for a HNC.

title: Completed my apprenticeship!
description: Served my time and became fully qualified.

title: Birthday!
description: I didn't sign up for this shit but I'm making the most of it!
